user.title: Set up Fitbit Treadmill Sync
user.description: This integration will sync your treadmill workouts to Fitbit. You'll need to authorize access to your Fitbit account.

entities.title: Select Treadmill Entities
entities.description: Select the sensors that track your treadmill status and distance.

conversion.title: Configure Step Conversion
conversion.description: Provide either your stride length or height to calculate steps from distance. The integration will try to use Fitbit's API first, falling back to manual calculation.

data_description.stride_length: Your stride length in feet (optional if height provided)
data_description.user_height: Your height in inches (optional if stride provided)

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate with Fitbit
reauth_confirm.description: Your Fitbit authentication has expired or been revoked. Please sign in again to continue syncing workouts.

error.stride_or_height_required: Please provide either stride length or height
error.stride_out_of_range: Stride length must be between 0.5 and 5.0 feet
error.height_out_of_range: Height must be between 36 and 96 inches

init.title: Configure Fitbit Treadmill Sync
init.description: Update your treadmill entities and step conversion settings.
